News

These is a history of all the news updates from de.ci.phe.red LAB.

June 10, 2020

Want to join us! There is vacancy for the post of Project Scientist in collaboration with IIT Delhi. See details here. Write to get@de.ci.phe.red for further queries.

April 22, 2020

Ahaan found vulnerability in a leading music app. Details revealed later !!!

April 22, 2020

Banashri got an acceptance in ACISP 2020: A Novel Duplication Based Countermeasure To Statistical Ineffective Fault Analysis. This is a joint work of de.ci.phe.red Lab with NTU Singapore

April 15, 2020

Sahiba and Satyam got their first paper in Africacrypt 2020: New Results on the SymSum Distinguisher on Round-Reduced SHA-3. Eprint version is available here.

February 20, 2020

#de.ci.phe.red Lab organised the first CTF competition as an inaugural event @IITBhilai

February 13, 2020

Aikata and Banashri got their first paper in HOST 2020: DESIV: Differential Fault Analysis of SIV-Rijndael256 with a Single Fault. Check it out here

Acknowledgement

This website is built using a Jekyll Template developed by the lab. The template is based on the minimal skeleton cssboilerplate. The website also uses GitHub:Buttons to generate all GitHub links. Documentation for the template is coming soon, so keep watch. In the meantime, feel free to tinker around and modify our template.
Logo Credits goto Utkarsh Alpuria. Check out his other work here.
Also, a shout out to the xkcd Comics of whom the designers are big fans.
